price: removiendo la ira que hay en ellos. Dios acepta el arrepentimiento de quien quiere. Dios lo sabe todo, es Sabio.
arabic: وَيُذۡهِبۡ غَيۡظَ قُلُوبِهِمۡۗ وَيَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wayudh'hib ghayẓa qulūbihim wayatūbu al-lahu ʿalā man yashāu wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
